title: The Ultimate Guide to JavaScript
content: JavaScript is a versatile language with many uses. In this guide, we explore its core concepts and advanced features.
author: John Doe

title: Understanding React Hooks
content: React Hooks are a way to use state and other React features without writing a class. This post explains the most commonly used hooks.
author: Jane Smith

title: A Beginner's Guide to Node.js
content: Node.js is a runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine. Learn the basics of building server-side applications with Node.js.
author: Alice Johnson

title: Advanced CSS Techniques
content: Explore advanced CSS techniques to make your web designs stand out, including flexbox, grid layout, and animations.
author: John Doe

title: Introduction to TypeScript
content: TypeScript adds optional static typing to JavaScript, improving code quality and maintainability. This post covers the basics.
author: Jane Smith
